thing-type.label: GJ meter (DSMR V3.0)
thing-type.description:
This is a Giga Joule meter that complies to the DSMR V3.0 specification.

It is not possible for the binding to detect if the GJ-meter is a cooling or a heating meter.
If you now on which M-Bus channel the cooling / heating meter is connected you can determine the channel from it's descriptor. The descriptor has the following format 'dsmr:gj_v3_0:[M-Bus channel]_[identifier]:[channelname].
If you don't know the M-Bus channel you can determine this by hand by comparing real meter values vs the reported values.

Refresh rate: 1 hour
